sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .team
        .wrapper
            h3.team__title Team of experts
            p.team__subtitle Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec in porttitor massa, nec vestibulum magna. Cras auctor sapien condimentum orci pharetra molestie. Cras auctor sapien condimentum orci pharetra molestie.
            .team__list
                .team__item(v-for="(index, item) in 9" :key="index" :style="{backgroundImage: 'url(' + require('@/assets/uploads/team-alice.png') + ')'}")
                    .team__info
                        p.team__name Alice Baker
                        span.team__position Technical Director
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Team',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .team {
        padding: 84px 0 100px 0;
        
        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Bold';
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 56px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #37393E;
            margin-bottom: 33px;
        }

        &__subtitle {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 25px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #3D4950;
            opacity: 0.7;
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 484px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            margin-bottom: 59px;
        }

        &__list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            grid-column-gap: 9px;
            grid-row-gap: 9px;
        }

        &__item {
            width: 232px;
            height: 323px;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
            background-size: cover;
            position: relative;
            transition: .3s all ease;

            &:hover {
                &:before {
                    opacity: 0.7;
                }
            }

            &:before {
                content: '';
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                position: absolute;
                z-index: 2;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                background: linear-gradient(165.38deg, #D55757 7.85%, #5EA3F8 105.07%);
                mix-blend-mode: lighten;
                opacity: 0;
                transition: .3s all ease;
            }
        }

        &__info {
            position: absolute;
            z-index: 2;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            bottom: 10px;
        }

        &__name {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 48px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #FFFFFF;
            margin-bottom: -10px;
        }

        &__position {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 20px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }
    }
</style>
